QuestData.Title: Patchwerk Must Die!
QuestData.Description: The so-called "avatar of war", Patchwerk is the ultimate abomination. It is also taking a heavy toll upon on our forces in the Dragonblight.$B$BI want you to assemble your companions and enter the Construct Quarter of Naxxramas. Disassemble the construct.$B$BThe Council of Six has decreed that Patchwerk must die!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Patchwerk.$B$BThis quest can be completed with any difficulty or size raid.
QuestData.RewardText: Children everywhere will sleep easier knowing that Patchwerk is no more.
